questions:

B) Daily life and people

D) Wildlife and animals

C) Over the ocean
D) Inside a museum

A) A peaceful nature scene

D) A family gathering

A) Trees and plants
B) People walking
C) Two ships
D) Animals

B) A person
C) A ship

A) A forest

A) Sand
B) Rocks

D) Four

C) Brown
D) Red
